scripts.dist: node scripts/repeka.js && (npm run dist:backend & npm run dist:frontend)
scripts.install: node scripts/repeka.js && (composer-runner -- install & cd src/FrontendModule && npm install)
scripts.lint: rm -fr var/reports/lints/*.xml && (npm run -s lint:backend & npm run -s lint:frontend)
scripts.test: npm run -s test:backend && npm run -s test:frontend
scripts.test:junit: rm -f var/reports/tests/*.xml var/reports/coverage/*.xml && (npm run -s test:backend:junit & (cd src/FrontendModule && npm run -s test:junit))
